Independencie Gods veritie: or, The necessitie of toleration. Unto which is added the chief principles of the government of independent churches. / Written by J.G. B.D. Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.
8 p.
Printed for William Ley, London : 1647.
J.G. = John Goodwin. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber: [i.e. October] 14th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
